remarks: Deduction version of bound-variable hypothesis builder ~ nfov . (Contributed by NM, 13-Dec-2005.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)
statement:
nfovd.2 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x A ) $.
nfovd.3 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x F ) $.
nfovd.4 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x B ) $.
nfovd $p |- ( ph -> F/_ x ( A F B ) ) $.
